titleStmt.title: Virgidemiarum. The three last bookes. Of byting satyres. Corrected and amended with some additions. by I.H.
Virgidemiarum. Books 4-6
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Richard Bradock] for Robert Dexter, at the signe of the Brasen Serpent in Paules Church yard,

notesStmt.note: The last three leaves are blank.
Identified as part of STC 12719 on UMI microfilm reel 321.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (same copy filmed twice).

place.placeName: the signe of the Brasen Serpent in Paules Church yard
